text: Cuts Like a Knife is the third album by the Canadian rock artist Bryan Adams. Released on January, 1983 through A&M; Records, the album became a big hit in Canada when it was released. Outside Canada and the United States the album did not sell as well. After the release of Reckless the album would chart on the British album chart and would later be a Silver Record by the BPI. It was made at Little Mountain Sound, in Vancouver, Canada. Three singles were released from the album: "Straight from the Heart", "Cuts Like a Knife" and "This Time", the three made Adams very popular. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== * Bryan Adams - vocals, guitars, piano * Jim Vallance - guitars, percussion, keyboards * Mickey Curry - drums * Tommy Mandel - organ, synthesizer * Keith Scott - guitars, vocals * Alfa Anderson - background vocals * Lou Gramm of Foreigner - background vocals ==References== Category:Bryan Adams albums Category:1983 albums Category:Rock albums
title: Cuts Like a Knife
